title: Stage Lv6-D2-S06
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Patient autonomy must be respected. (professional variant 1)
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Patient autonomy must be respected. (professional variant 1)
Informed consent was obtained. (professional variant 1)
The physician's duty of beneficence takes precedence. (professional variant 1)
The principle of non-maleficence is observed. (professional variant 1)
Patient confidentiality is strictly protected. (professional variant 1)
Medical justice must be applied equitably. (professional variant 1)

sentences.kr: 생명 연장 치료를 거부할 권리가 있습니다. (전문 1)
sentences.en: There is a right to refuse life-sustaining treatment. (professional variant 1)
Professional responsibility of healthcare providers is paramount. (professional variant 1)
Patient dignity must be ensured. (professional variant 1)
Ethics committee review is required. (professional variant 1)
Patient autonomy must be respected. (professional variant 2)
Informed consent was obtained. (professional variant 2)
The physician's duty of beneficence takes precedence. (professional variant 2)
The principle of non-maleficence is observed. (professional variant 2)
Patient confidentiality is strictly protected. (professional variant 2)
Medical justice must be applied equitably. (professional variant 2)
